description.en: Nydronia is a cryptocurrency token built with ethereum blockchain or stablecoin backed by products that will be created by the union of the founders with companies, producers and industries whose unit will have as application the application of blockchain networks and robotization, optimizing from the smallest to the most complex of the entity. Obtaining as a result lower cost and higher quality products. To then be sold to merchants in any type of cryptocurrency, but highlighting the discount for the purchase of products with our token, thus obtaining indirect beneficiary support for producers, entrepreneurs, merchants and the general public.
